member.name: T:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_HD44780
member.summary: A Display_HD44780 module for Microsoft .NET Gadgeteer

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_HD44780.#ctor(System.Int32)
member.param: The socket that this module is plugged in to.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_HD44780.Initialize
member.summary: This function will enable the display, clean it, and enter 4-bit mode.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_HD44780.PrintString(System.String)
member.summary: Prints the passed in string to the screen at the current cursor position. Note: This function will move the cursor position after.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_HD44780.Putc(System.Byte)
member.summary: Sends an ASCII character to the LCD at the current cursor position. Note: This function will move the cursor position after.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_HD44780.CursorHome
member.summary: Places the cursor at the top left of the screen.

member.name: M:Gadgeteer.Modules.GHIElectronics.Display_HD44780.SetCursor(System.Byte,System.Byte)
member.summary: Set the cursor to the passed in position.
member.param: Row of the desired cursor position.
Column of the desired cursor position.
